Are you ready to take your ClickUp skills to the next level? Join the Build Your First Workflow webinar and we'll walk you through advanced strategies to design efficient workflows. We'll teach you how to automate tasks that will save you time and let you get more work done.


Build Your First Workflow
Date: March 25
Time: 10 am PT / 1 pm ET

What we'll cover:
- Revisiting ClickUpâ€™s core features
- Step-by-step workflow creation
- Using forms for smoother intake processes
- Automating tasks to save time
- LIVE demo & Q&A
